channel.title: Guix on Braindump
channel.description: Recent content in Guix on Braindump

item.title: Guix
item.description: GNU Guix is a package manager for GNU/Linux systems. It is designed to give users more control over their general-purpose and specialized computing environments, and make these easier to reproduce over time and deploy to one or many devices.

item.title: nonguix
item.description: channel for packages that can’t be included upstream. Please do NOT promote or refer to this repository on any official Guix communication channels.
